Package org.eclipse.mosaic.rti.federation

Class DistributedFederationManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.mosaic.rti.federation.LocalFederationManagement
      • org.eclipse.mosaic.rti.federation.DistributedFederationManagement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FederationManagement
    public class DistributedFederationManagement
extends LocalFederationManagement
    This extension of LocalFederationManagement allows additionally to the local administration an administration on remote hosts using SSH.
    See Also:
    FederationManagement

    • Method Detail

      • stopFederation

        public void stopFederation()
                    throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: FederationManagement
        Stops the federation. All resources of federates are freed. Afterwards, no new federates are allowed to join.
        Specified by:
        stopFederation in interface FederationManagement
        Overrides:
        stopFederation in class LocalFederationManagement
        Throws:
        Exception
